This Ġpaper Ġproposes Ġthe Ġidea Ġof Ġhaving Ġan Ġagent Ġlearning Ġa Ġpolicy Ġthat Ġres ets Ġthe Ġagent 's Ġstate Ġto Ġone Ġof Ġthe Ġstates Ġdrawn Ġfrom Ġthe Ġdistribution Ġof Ġstarting Ġstates Ġ.	O	O	Review	374

This Ġapproach Ġgenerates Ġmore Ġautonomous Ġagents Ġthat Ġrequire Ġfewer Ġhuman Ġinterventions Ġin Ġthe Ġlearning Ġprocess Ġ.	O	O	Review	374
This Ġis Ġa Ġvery Ġelegant Ġand Ġgeneral Ġidea , Ġwhere Ġthe Ġvalue Ġfunction Ġlearned Ġin Ġthe Ġreset Ġtask Ġalso Ġenc odes Ġsome Ġmeasure Ġof Ġsafety Ġin Ġthe Ġenvironment Ġ.	O	O	Review	374

[URL] ĠModel - based Ġalternative Ġ- ĠWe Ġappreciate Ġthe Ġcomment Ġregarding Ġa Ġpotential Ġmodel - based Ġalternative Ġto Ġour Ġmethod Ġ.	B-Reply	B-3	Reply	374

<sep> ĠIn Ġthis Ġpaper , Ġthe Ġauthors Ġproposed Ġa Ġmodel Ġcalled ĠSD - GAN , Ġto Ġdecom pose Ġsem ant ical Ġcomponent Ġof Ġthe Ġinput Ġin ĠG AN Ġ.	O	O	Review	477

By Ġtraining Ġthe Ġwhole Ġmodel Ġwith Ġa Ġconventional ĠG AN - training Ġregime , ĠSD - GAN Ġlearns Ġto Ġtake Ġa Ġpart Ġof Ġthe Ġinput ĠZ Ġas Ġthe Ġidentity Ġinformation , Ġand Ġthe Ġother Ġpart Ġof Ġinput ĠZ Ġas Ġthe Ġnon - ident ity Ġ( or Ġattribute ) Ġinformation Ġ.	O	O	Review	477

[URL] ĠRegarding Ġthe Ġload Ġbalancing : ĠThe Ġmain Ġissue Ġof Ġload Ġbalancing Ġis Ġthat Ġthe Ġlength Ġof Ġeach Ġphase Ġis Ġdetermined Ġby Ġthe Ġagent Ġwith Ġmaximum Ġnumber Ġof Ġremaining Ġarms , Ġsince Ġall Ġagents Ġrun Ġconcurrently Ġand Ġneed Ġto Ġsynchron ize Ġat Ġthe Ġend Ġof Ġeach Ġepoch Ġ. [URL] ĠRegarding Ġthe ĠUC B Ġalgorithm : ĠIn Ġfact , Ġfor Ġmulti - armed Ġbandits , Ġthe Ġfirst Ġprotocol Ġwe Ġdesigned Ġwith Ġnear - opt imal Ġregret Ġand Ġefficient Ġcommunication Ġis Ġbased Ġon ĠUC B Ġapproach Ġ.	B-Reply	B-3	Reply	20419

Collect ive Ġmatrix Ġfactor ization Ġ( CM F ) Ġis Ġa Ġmethod Ġfor Ġlearning Ġentity Ġembed d ings Ġby Ġjointly Ġfactor izing Ġa Ġcollection Ġof Ġmat rices , Ġeach Ġof Ġwhich Ġdescribes Ġa Ġrelationship Ġbetween Ġentities Ġof Ġtwo Ġtypes Ġ.	O	O	Review	33
The Ġset Ġof Ġrows / column s Ġof Ġa Ġmatrix Ġcorresponds Ġto Ġan Ġentity Ġtype , Ġwhile Ġeach Ġrow / column Ġof Ġthe Ġmatrix Ġcorresponds Ġto Ġa Ġdifferent Ġentity Ġof Ġthe Ġtype Ġ.	O	O	Review	33
This Ġapproach Ġassumes Ġthat Ġall Ġdimensions Ġof Ġthe Ġembed d ings Ġof Ġentities Ġof Ġa Ġparticular Ġtype Ġare Ġrelevant Ġfor Ġmodelling Ġall Ġthe Ġrelationships Ġthey Ġare Ġinvolved Ġin Ġ.	O	O	Review	33
This Ġpaper Ġextends ĠCM F Ġby Ġrelaxing Ġthis Ġassumption Ġand Ġallowing Ġembed d ings Ġto Ġhave Ġdimensions Ġused Ġfor Ġmodelling Ġonly Ġsome Ġof Ġthe Ġrelationships Ġthe Ġentities Ġare Ġinvolved Ġin Ġ.	O	O	Review	33
This Ġis Ġachieved Ġby Ġextending Ġthe Ġmodel Ġto Ġinclude Ġa Ġseparate Ġprecision Ġfor Ġeach Ġembed ding Ġdimension Ġof Ġeach Ġtype Ġto Ġencourage Ġgroup - s parse Ġsolutions Ġ.	O	O	Review	33
The Ġauthors Ġpropose Ġtraining Ġthe Ġresulting Ġmodels Ġusing Ġa Ġvari ational ĠBay es Ġalgorithm Ġand Ġshow Ġhow Ġto Ġhandle Ġboth ĠGa ussian Ġand Ġnon - Ga ussian Ġobservations Ġ.	O	O	Review	33
The Ġpaper Ġis Ġnicely Ġwritten Ġand Ġmakes Ġa Ġsmall Ġbut Ġnovel Ġextension Ġto ĠCM F Ġ.	O	O	Review	33
The Ġresulting Ġapproach Ġis Ġsimple , Ġand Ġseems Ġscalable Ġand Ġwidely Ġapplicable Ġ.	O	O	Review	33
The Ġexperiments Ġare Ġfairly Ġsmall - scale Ġbut Ġare Ġsufficient Ġfor Ġillustrating Ġthe Ġadvantages Ġof Ġthe Ġmethod Ġ.	O	O	Review	33
Correct ions :	O	O	Review	33
In Ġthe Ġsection Ġdealing Ġnon - Ga ussian Ġobservations , Ġthe Ġpseudo - data Ġis Ġreferred Ġto Ġas ĠY Ġinstead Ġof ĠZ _ m Ġ.	O	O	Review	33
The Ġdescription Ġof Ġvari ational ĠBay es Ġas Ġ' min im izing Ġthe ĠKL Ġdivergence Ġbetween Ġthe Ġobservation Ġprobability Ġand Ġ... ' Ġis Ġnot Ġquite Ġright , Ġas Ġit Ġseems Ġto Ġdescribe ĠKL ( P || Q ) Ġinstead Ġof ĠKL ( Q || P ) Ġ.	O	O	Review	33

The Ġmanuscript Ġartic ulates Ġa Ġproblem Ġwith Ġearlier Ġsolutions Ġto Ġthe ĠCollective ĠMatrix ĠFactor ization Ġ( CM F ) Ġproblem Ġin Ġmulti - view Ġlearning Ġformulations Ġand Ġproposes Ġa Ġnovel Ġsolution Ġto Ġaddress Ġthe Ġissue Ġ.	O	O	Review	33
The Ġconcern Ġis Ġthat Ġcurrent ĠCM F Ġschemes Ġignore Ġthe Ġpotential Ġfor Ġview - specific Ġstructure Ġor Ġnoise Ġby Ġimplicitly Ġassuming Ġthat Ġstructure Ġmust Ġbe Ġshared Ġamong Ġall Ġviews Ġ.	O	O	Review	33
The Ġauthors Ġsolve Ġthis Ġproblem Ġby Ġputting Ġgroup - s parse Ġpri ors Ġon Ġthe Ġcolumns Ġof Ġthe Ġmat rices Ġ.	O	O	Review	33
This Ġallows Ġprivate Ġfactors Ġthat Ġcan Ġbe Ġspecific Ġto Ġone Ġor Ġeven Ġa Ġsubset Ġof Ġthe Ġmat rices Ġ.	O	O	Review	33
Also Ġnote Ġthat Ġthe Ġuse Ġof Ġvari ational ĠBay esian Ġlearning Ġby Ġthe Ġauthors Ġprovides Ġa Ġlarge Ġreduction Ġin Ġcomputational Ġcomplexity Ġrelative Ġto Ġthe ĠMAP Ġestimates Ġused Ġin Ġsome Ġof Ġthe Ġprior Ġliterature Ġ.	O	O	Review	33
[URL] ĠI Ġagree Ġwith Ġthe Ġimportance Ġof Ġthe Ġproblem Ġbeing Ġaddressed Ġsince , Ġclearly , Ġthe Ġneed Ġto Ġaccommodate Ġview - Ġor Ġsubset - specific Ġstructure Ġis Ġgoing Ġto Ġbe Ġimportant Ġin Ġmany Ġreal - world Ġproblems Ġ.	O	O	Review	33

The Ġauthors Ġpropose Ġa Ġnew Ġmethod Ġof Ġsecurely Ġevaluating Ġneural Ġnetworks Ġ.	O	O	Review	128
The Ġapproach Ġbuilds Ġupon Ġexisting ĠTr usted ĠExecution ĠEn vironments Ġ( T EE ), Ġa Ġcombination Ġof Ġhardware Ġand Ġsoftware Ġthat Ġisol ates Ġsensitive Ġcomput ations Ġfrom Ġthe Ġunt r usted Ġsoftware Ġstack Ġ.	O	O	Review	128
The Ġdownside Ġof ĠT EE Ġis Ġthat Ġit Ġis Ġexpensive Ġand Ġslow Ġto Ġrun Ġ.	O	O	Review	128
This Ġpaper Ġproposes Ġoutsourcing Ġthe Ġlinear Ġevaluation Ġportions Ġof Ġthe ĠD NN Ġto Ġan Ġunt r usted Ġstack Ġthat 's Ġco - l ocated Ġwith Ġthe ĠT EE Ġ.	O	O	Review	128
To Ġachieve Ġprivacy Ġ( i . e ., Ġthe Ġinput Ġisn 't Ġrevealed Ġto Ġthe Ġunt r usted Ġeval u ator ), Ġthe Ġapproach Ġadds Ġa Ġrandom Ġnumber Ġr Ġto Ġthe Ġinput Ġvector Ġx , Ġevaluates Ġf ( x + r ) Ġon Ġthe Ġunt r usted Ġstack , Ġthen Ġsubtract s Ġoff Ġf ( r ) Ġfrom Ġthe Ġoutput Ġ.	O	O	Review	128
This Ġlimits Ġthe Ġapproach Ġto Ġbe Ġapplicable Ġto Ġonly Ġlinear Ġfunctions Ġ.	O	O	Review	128
To Ġachieve Ġintegrity Ġ( ver ify Ġthe Ġcorrectness Ġof Ġthe Ġoutput ), Ġthe Ġpaper Ġproposes Ġtesting Ġwith Ġrandom Ġinput Ġvectors Ġ( an Ġapplication Ġof ĠFre iv ald s Ġtheorem , Ġwhich Ġbounds Ġthe Ġerror Ġprobability ) Ġ.	O	O	Review	128
The Ġtechniques Ġfor Ġintegrity Ġand Ġprivacy Ġworks Ġonly Ġon Ġinteger Ġevaluations , Ġhence Ġthe Ġnetwork Ġweights Ġand Ġinputs Ġneed Ġto Ġbe Ġquant ized Ġ.	O	O	Review	128
The Ġpaper Ġtries Ġto Ġminimize Ġdegradation Ġin Ġaccuracy Ġby Ġquant izing Ġas Ġfinely Ġas Ġnumer ically Ġallowable , Ġachieving Ġ< [NUM] Ġ% Ġdrop Ġin Ġaccuracy Ġon Ġtwo Ġexample ĠD NN s Ġ.	O	O	Review	128

Summary : Ġthe Ġpaper Ġintroduces Ġa Ġnew Ġway Ġof Ġfine - tun ing Ġneural Ġnetworks Ġ.	O	O	Review	184

[URL] ĠEffect Ġon Ġcompute Ġof Ġnot Ġquant izing Ġfirst Ġlayer Ġand Ġlast :	O	O	Reply	511

The Ġpaper Ġstudies Ġthe Ġeffect Ġof Ġreduced Ġprecision Ġweights Ġand Ġactiv ations Ġon Ġthe Ġperformance , Ġmemory Ġand Ġcomputation Ġcost Ġof Ġdeep Ġnetworks Ġand Ġproposes Ġa Ġquant ization Ġscheme Ġand Ġwide Ġfilters Ġto Ġoffset Ġthe Ġaccuracy Ġlost Ġdue Ġto Ġthe Ġreduced Ġprecision Ġ. This Ġpaper Ġpresents Ġa Ġnovel Ġun super vised Ġdomain Ġadaptation Ġframework Ġfor Ġneural Ġnetworks Ġ.	O	O	Review	554
Similarly Ġto Ġexisting Ġapproaches , Ġit Ġperforms Ġadaptation Ġby Ġalign ing Ġrepresentations Ġof Ġthe Ġsource Ġand Ġthe Ġtarget Ġdomains Ġ.	O	O	Review	554
The Ġmain Ġdifference Ġis Ġthat Ġthis Ġalignment Ġis Ġachieved Ġnot Ġthrough Ġexplicitly Ġminimizing Ġsome Ġdistribution Ġdiscrepancy Ġ( this Ġusually Ġleads Ġto Ġchallenging Ġminim ax Ġoptimization Ġproblems ) Ġ.	O	O	Review	554
Instead , Ġthe Ġauthors Ġpropose Ġto Ġuse Ġa Ġbattery Ġof Ġauxiliary Ġself - super vised Ġlearning Ġ( SSL ) Ġtasks Ġfor Ġboth Ġdomains Ġsimultaneously Ġ.	O	O	Review	554
Each Ġtask Ġis Ġmeant Ġto Ġalign Ġthe Ġsource Ġand Ġthe Ġtarget Ġrepresentations Ġalong Ġa Ġdirection Ġof Ġvariation Ġrelevant Ġto Ġthat Ġtask Ġ.	O	O	Review	554
Assuming Ġthat Ġthe Ġbattery Ġis Ġdiverse Ġenough , Ġoptimizing Ġthe Ġrepresentation Ġfor Ġall Ġthe Ġtasks Ġleads Ġto Ġmatching Ġof Ġthe Ġdistributions Ġ.	O	O	Review	554

[URL] Ġ( 1 ) ĠThe ĠMN IST - Multiple Ġdataset Ġis Ġa Ġcontrolled Ġexperiment , Ġsimilar Ġto ĠMN IST - CD / CB Ġ[ a ], Ġdesigned Ġto Ġverify Ġour Ġmethod 's Ġability Ġto Ġdis ent angle Ġcontent Ġand Ġstyle Ġrepresentations Ġduring ĠI 2 I Ġtranslation Ġ.	I-Reply	I-1	Reply	405
In Ġparticular , Ġthe Ġcontent Ġis Ġrepresented Ġby Ġthe Ġdifferent Ġdigits Ġ( 0 - 9 ) Ġand Ġbackground Ġclasses , Ġwhereas Ġstyle Ġis Ġrepresented Ġby Ġthe Ġshape Ġand Ġcolor Ġvariation Ġadded Ġin Ġdigits Ġas Ġwell Ġas Ġthe Ġ( black Ġor Ġwhite ) Ġbackground Ġcolors Ġ.	I-Reply	I-1	Reply	405
Our Ġgoal Ġis Ġto Ġencourage Ġthe Ġnetwork Ġto Ġunderstand Ġthe Ġsemantic Ġinformation , Ġi . e . Ġthe Ġdifferent Ġdigits Ġand Ġbackgrounds , Ġwhen Ġtranslating Ġan Ġimage Ġfrom Ġdomain ĠA Ġto Ġdomain ĠB . ĠThat Ġis , Ġa Ġsuccessfully Ġtranslated Ġimage Ġshould Ġhave Ġthe Ġcontent Ġof Ġdomain ĠA , Ġi . e . Ġthe Ġdigit Ġclass , Ġand Ġthe Ġstyle Ġof Ġdomain ĠB , Ġi . e . [URL] Ġ( 2 ) ĠWe Ġcan Ġachieve Ġthis Ġby Ġusing Ġthe Ġproposed ĠEG SC - IT Ġmodel Ġ.	B-Reply	B-1	Reply	405
First , Ġthe Ġfeature Ġmask Ġsub - network Ġ( F _ A Ġin ĠFig . 2 ) Ġextracts Ġthe Ġcontent Ġinformation , Ġi . e . Ġthe Ġdigit Ġclass , Ġand Ġprovides Ġit Ġto Ġthe Ġdec oder Ġ.	I-Reply	I-1	Reply	405
Second , Ġthe Ġemployed Ġperceptual Ġloss Ġencourages Ġthe Ġdec oder Ġto Ġlearn Ġhow Ġto Ġuse Ġthis Ġcontent Ġinformation Ġto Ġdo Ġthe Ġtranslation Ġwhile Ġretaining Ġsemantic Ġconsistency Ġ.	I-Reply	I-1	Reply	405

[URL] Ġ( 3 ) ĠWe Ġagree Ġwith ĠReview er Ġ1 Ġthat Ġthis Ġexperiment Ġis Ġquite Ġchallenging , Ġbut Ġwe Ġobserve Ġthat Ġour Ġmodel Ġcan Ġstill Ġobtain Ġgood Ġresults Ġwithout Ġthe Ġneed Ġfor Ġground - truth Ġsemantic Ġlabels Ġor Ġpaired Ġdata Ġ.	B-Reply	B-1	Reply	405

ĠThis Ġis Ġa Ġwell - known Ġtechnique Ġin Ġthe Ġstyle Ġtransfer Ġfield Ġwhich Ġhas Ġproven Ġto Ġbe Ġvery Ġsuccessful Ġfor Ġarbitrary Ġstyle Ġtransfers , Ġand Ġhas Ġbeen Ġadopted Ġby Ġmany Ġfollow - up Ġworks Ġ. The Ġidea Ġbehind ĠAda IN Ġin Ġour Ġcase Ġis Ġto Ġalign Ġthe Ġmean Ġand Ġvariance Ġof Ġthe Ġcontent Ġfeature Ġchannels Ġcoming Ġfrom Ġdomain ĠA Ġ( after Ġapplying Ġthe Ġfeature Ġmask ) Ġwith Ġthose Ġof Ġthe Ġstyle Ġfeature Ġchannels Ġcoming Ġfrom Ġdomain ĠB . This Ġpaper Ġproposes Ġa Ġfirst Ġstep Ġin Ġthe Ġdirection Ġof Ġ' real - world Ġrelevant ĠRL Ġapproaches ' Ġin Ġthe Ġsense Ġof Ġconsidering Ġenvironments Ġthat Ġdon 't Ġhalt Ġtheir Ġexecution Ġuntil Ġan Ġagent Ġhas Ġfinished Ġits Ġoptimal Ġaction Ġcomputation Ġand Ġexecution Ġbut Ġactually Ġjust Ġgo Ġon Ġbeing Ġan Ġenvironment Ġ.	O	O	Review	405
For Ġthis , Ġthe Ġnotion Ġof Ġa Ġconcurrent Ġaction Ġis Ġintroduced Ġ.	O	O	Review	405
The Ġpaper Ġfocuses Ġon Ġvalue - based ĠRL Ġapproaches Ġ.	O	O	Review	405
It Ġintroduces Ġmodifications Ġto Ġthe Ġclassical ĠM DP Ġformulation Ġsuch Ġthat Ġconcurrent Ġactions Ġcan Ġbe Ġhandled Ġ.	O	O	Review	405
From Ġa Ġtheoretical Ġperspective Ġthe Ġresulting ĠBell man Ġoperators Ġ( for Ġboth Ġcontinuous Ġand Ġdiscrete Ġtime ) Ġremain Ġcontract ions Ġand Ġthus Ġmaintain Ġq - learning Ġconvergence Ġguarantees Ġ.	O	O	Review	405
Q learning Ġmodels Ġare Ġadopted Ġto Ġsupport Ġconcurrent Ġactions Ġand Ġthe Ġexperiments Ġdemonstrate Ġthat Ġthe Ġsuggested Ġenhancements Ġare Ġworking Ġwell Ġ.	O	O	Review	405

We Ġthank Ġthe Ġreviewer Ġfor Ġtheir Ġpositive Ġreview Ġand Ġan Ġaccurate Ġsummary Ġof Ġthe Ġpaper Ġ.	O	O	Reply	405


This Ġpaper Ġconsiders Ġthe Ġtheoretically Ġinteresting Ġand Ġpractically Ġimportant Ġproblem Ġof Ġconcurrent Ġdeep Ġreinforcement Ġlearning Ġ( DR L ), Ġi . e ., ĠD RL Ġin Ġwhich Ġthe Ġagent Ġhas Ġto Ġdecide Ġthe Ġnext Ġaction Ġwhile Ġperforming Ġthe Ġprevious Ġone Ġ.	O	O	Review	405
This Ġintroduces Ġseveral Ġsignificant Ġchallenges , Ġincluding Ġdelays / lat ency Ġand Ġinterruption Ġof Ġan Ġon - going Ġaction Ġ.	O	O	Review	405
To Ġaddress Ġthis Ġissue , Ġthis Ġpaper Ġproposes Ġto Ġconsider Ġthe Ġcontinuous Ġtime Ġformulation Ġof Ġthe Ġconcurrent Ġcontrol Ġproblem , Ġderive Ġa Ġcontinuous - time ĠBell man Ġequation Ġfor Ġthe Ġconcurrent Ġcontrol Ġscenarios , Ġand Ġthen Ġderive Ġits Ġdiscrete - time Ġcounterpart Ġ.	O	O	Review	405
Cont raction Ġproperties Ġare Ġshown Ġfor Ġboth Ġthe Ġcontinuous - time Ġand Ġdiscrete - time Ġconcurrent ĠBell man Ġequations , Ġand Ġa Ġvalue - based ĠD RL Ġalgorithm Ġbased Ġon Ġthe Ġconcurrent ĠBell man Ġequations Ġis Ġproposed Ġand Ġtested Ġon Ġa Ġfew Ġtasks Ġ.	O	O	Review	405
[URL] ĠThe Ġhigh Ġlevel Ġidea Ġof Ġthis Ġpaper Ġis Ġvery Ġinteresting Ġand Ġattractive , Ġand Ġin Ġparticular , Ġthe Ġintroduction Ġof Ġcontinuous - time Ġreinforcement Ġlearning Ġis Ġnovel Ġ.	O	O	Review	405
In Ġaddition , Ġthe Ġnumerical Ġexperiments Ġdo Ġshow Ġthat Ġa Ġconsistently Ġimproved Ġperformance Ġof Ġthe Ġproposed Ġapproach Ġon Ġboth Ġsynthetic Ġand Ġmore Ġreal - world Ġrobotic Ġcontrol Ġtasks Ġ.	O	O	Review	405
However , Ġthere Ġare Ġseveral Ġsignificant Ġissues Ġabout Ġtechnical Ġclarity Ġor Ġeven Ġcorrectness Ġin Ġthis Ġpaper , Ġwhich ĠI Ġelaborate Ġbelow :	O	O	Review	405

[URL] ĠCons :	O	O	Review	407
1 Ġ.	O	O	Review	407
[TAB] ĠI Ġdo Ġnot Ġthink Ġthat Ġthe Ġmodel Ġproposed Ġin Ġthis Ġpaper Ġis Ġable Ġto Ġtackle Ġlifelong Ġlearning Ġproblem Ġ.	B-Review	B-1	Review	407
The Ġmain Ġreason Ġis Ġthat Ġlifelong Ġlearning Ġbasically Ġrequires Ġonly Ġone Ġmodel Ġthat Ġwill Ġcontinue Ġto Ġlearn Ġfrom Ġnew Ġtasks Ġ.	I-Review	I-1	Review	407
After Ġlearning Ġseveral Ġnew Ġtasks , Ġpeople Ġhope Ġthis Ġmodel Ġcan Ġstill Ġperform Ġwell Ġon Ġthe Ġprevious Ġtasks Ġas Ġwell Ġas Ġthe Ġcurrent Ġones Ġ.	I-Review	I-1	Review	407
However , Ġin Ġthis Ġpaper , Ġnot Ġonly Ġone Ġmodel Ġis Ġlearned Ġ.	I-Review	I-1	Review	407
Instead , Ġnew Ġmodels Ġappear Ġwhen Ġnew Ġtasks Ġare Ġgiven , Ġwhich Ġdoes Ġnot Ġmeet Ġthe Ġdefinition Ġor Ġrequirement Ġof Ġlifelong Ġlearning Ġ.	I-Review	I-1	Review	407

<sep> ĠGrad ient Ġclipping Ġhas Ġbeen Ġstudied Ġas Ġan Ġoptimization Ġtechnique Ġand Ġalso Ġas Ġa Ġtool Ġfor Ġprivacy Ġpreserving , Ġbut Ġin Ġthis Ġpaper , Ġit Ġstudies Ġthe Ġrobust ness Ġproperties Ġof Ġgradient Ġclipping Ġ.	O	O	Review	10101

<sep> ĠA 1 : ĠYes Ġ.	B-Reply	B-1	Reply	578
In Ġrepresentation Ġtheory Ġin Ġmathematics , Ġfor Ġa Ġgroup ĠG , Ġeach Ġelement Ġg Ġis Ġrepresented Ġby Ġa Ġmatrix ĠM ( g ) Ġacting Ġon Ġthe Ġvector Ġv Ġin Ġa Ġvector Ġspace Ġ.	I-Reply	I-1	Reply	578
For Ġtwo Ġelements Ġg 1 Ġand Ġg 2 Ġin ĠG , Ġg 1 * g 2 Ġis Ġrepresented Ġby ĠM ( g 1 ) ĠM ( g 2 ) Ġ.	I-Reply	I-1	Reply	578
In Ġour Ġwork , Ġthe Ġdispl acements Ġdx Ġform Ġa Ġ2 D ĠEucl ide an Ġgroup Ġ.	I-Reply	I-1	Reply	578
Each Ġdx Ġis Ġrepresented Ġby Ġa Ġmatrix ĠM ( dx ) Ġacting Ġon Ġthe Ġvector Ġv ( x ) Ġthat Ġrepresents Ġthe Ġlocal Ġimage Ġcontent Ġ.	I-Reply	I-1	Reply	578
[URL] ĠIn Ġquantum Ġphysics , Ġa Ġparticle Ġat Ġposition Ġx Ġis Ġrepresented Ġby Ġa Ġvector Ġv ( x ) Ġin Ġa ĠHilbert Ġspace Ġ.	I-Reply	I-1	Reply	578
If Ġthe Ġparticle Ġundergo es Ġa Ġdisplacement Ġdx , Ġthe Ġvector Ġis Ġtransformed Ġby Ġa Ġdisplacement Ġmatrix Ġ( or Ġoperator ) ĠM ( dx ), Ġso Ġthat Ġv ( x + dx ) Ġ= ĠM ( dx ) Ġv ( x ) Ġ.	I-Reply	I-1	Reply	578
In Ġour Ġwork , Ġv ( x ) Ġrepresents Ġthe Ġlocal Ġimage Ġcontent , Ġand ĠM ( dx ) Ġrepresents Ġpixel Ġdisplacement Ġ.	I-Reply	I-1	Reply	578
<sep> ĠMore Ġgenerally , Ġa Ġparticle Ġof Ġa Ġcertain Ġmomentum Ġwith Ġa Ġcertain Ġspin Ġ( as Ġwell Ġas Ġother Ġproperties ) Ġis Ġrepresented Ġby Ġa Ġvector Ġin Ġa ĠHilbert Ġspace Ġ.	I-Reply	I-1	Reply	578
When Ġthe Ġparticle Ġundergo es Ġa ĠLore nt z Ġtransformation Ġ( a Ġmore Ġgeneral Ġnotion Ġof Ġdisplacement Ġin Ġspace - time ), Ġthe Ġvector Ġis Ġmultiplied Ġby Ġa Ġmatrix Ġ( or Ġoperator ) Ġrepresenting Ġthe ĠLore nt z Ġtransformation Ġ.	I-Reply	I-1	Reply	578
Different Ġtypes Ġof Ġparticles Ġcorrespond Ġto Ġdifferent Ġschemes Ġof Ġrepresenting Ġthe ĠLore nt z Ġtransformations Ġ.	I-Reply	I-1	Reply	578
<sep> ĠWe Ġadopt Ġsuch Ġmathematical Ġlanguage Ġin Ġour Ġwork Ġ.	I-Reply	I-1	Reply	578
More Ġgenerally , Ġwe Ġmay Ġuse Ġvectors Ġto Ġrepresent Ġvarious Ġobjects Ġin Ġthe Ġimage , Ġand Ġuse Ġmat rices Ġto Ġrepresent Ġthe Ġmotions Ġof Ġthese Ġobjects Ġ.	I-Reply	I-1	Reply	578
<sep> ĠSuch Ġa Ġmathematical Ġlanguage Ġwas Ġadopted Ġby Ġearlier Ġpapers Ġbefore Ġ.	I-Reply	I-1	Reply	578
<sep> ĠIn Ġ[ 1 ], Ġthe Ġauthors Ġstudy Ġthe Ġchange Ġof Ġimages Ġwhen Ġthe Ġcamera Ġundergo es Ġmotion Ġ.	I-Reply	I-1	Reply	578

Summary :	O	O	Review	578
This Ġpaper Ġproposes Ġa Ġrepresentation Ġmodel Ġfor Ġdescribing Ġlocal Ġpixel Ġdisplacement Ġ.	O	O	Review	578
The Ġproposed Ġmodel Ġuses Ġmatrix Ġmultiplication Ġfor Ġoptical Ġflow Ġestimation , Ġwhere Ġan Ġimage Ġis Ġtransformed Ġinto Ġa Ġvector Ġand Ġthe Ġlocal Ġmotion Ġis Ġmodeled Ġby Ġa Ġmatrix Ġ.	O	O	Review	578
<sep> ĠThe Ġrecommendation Ġof Ġthis Ġwork Ġis Ġbased Ġon Ġthe Ġfollowing Ġreasons Ġ.	O	O	Review	578

[URL] ĠReply : ĠWe Ġcan Ġconsider Ġthe Ġthreshold Ġin ĠPG Ġas Ġa Ġmeasurement Ġof Ġthe Ġimportance Ġof Ġan Ġoutput Ġfeature Ġ.	B-Reply	B-2	Reply	20025
If Ġthe ĠMS B Ġresult Ġexceeds Ġthe Ġthreshold , Ġit Ġmeans Ġthat Ġthe Ġcorresponding Ġoutput Ġfeature Ġis Ġimportant Ġ.	I-Reply	I-2	Reply	20025
We Ġwill Ġthen Ġcompute Ġthis Ġimportant Ġfeature Ġin Ġhigh Ġprecision Ġ.	I-Reply	I-2	Reply	20025
In Ġthe Ġbell Ġshaped Ġactivation Ġdistribution , Ġthe Ġlarger Ġa Ġthreshold Ġis , Ġthe Ġless Ġlikely Ġan Ġoutput Ġfeature Ġwill Ġexceed Ġthe Ġthreshold , Ġand Ġthus Ġthe Ġmore Ġoutput Ġfeatures Ġwill Ġbe Ġcomputed Ġusing Ġreduced Ġprecision Ġ.	I-Reply	I-2	Reply	20025
H ence Ġa Ġlarge Ġthreshold Ġis Ġdesired Ġto Ġreduce Ġthe Ġcomputational Ġcost Ġ.	I-Reply	I-2	Reply	20025
We Ġintroduce Ġa Ġthreshold Ġloss Ġto Ġmake Ġthe Ġthreshold Ġapproach Ġa Ġlarge Ġvalue Ġ.	I-Reply	I-2	Reply	20025
Moreover , Ġthe Ġthreshold Ġis Ġalso Ġoptimized Ġby Ġminimizing Ġthe Ġaccuracy Ġloss Ġ.	I-Reply	I-2	Reply	20025
As Ġa Ġresult , Ġthe Ġtrain able Ġthresholds Ġare Ġlearned Ġto Ġjointly Ġminimize Ġthe Ġthreshold Ġloss Ġand Ġthe Ġaccuracy Ġloss Ġ.	I-Reply	I-2	Reply	20025

[URL] ĠWe Ġagree Ġthat Ġcalculating Ġthe Ġbit width Ġper Ġlayer Ġand Ġsum ming Ġthem Ġup Ġis Ġanother Ġgood Ġmetric Ġ.	I-Reply	I-3	Reply	20025

<sep> ĠIn Ġthis Ġpaper , Ġthe Ġauthors Ġproposed Ġa Ġnew Ġformat Ġof Ġrepresentation Ġcalled Ġscene Ġprograms , Ġto Ġdescribe Ġthe Ġvisual Ġscenes Ġ.	O	O	Review	471

The Ġarticle Ġ" P air Norm : ĠT ack ling ĠOvers m oot hing Ġin ĠG NN s " Ġconsiders Ġthe Ġinteresting Ġphenomenon Ġof Ġperformance Ġdegradation Ġof Ġgraph Ġneural Ġnetwork Ġwhen Ġthe Ġdepth Ġof Ġthe Ġnetwork Ġincreases Ġbeyond Ġthe Ġvalues Ġof Ġ2 - 4 Ġ.	O	O	Review	365

<sep> ĠIt Ġis Ġknown Ġthat ĠG NN s Ġare Ġvulnerable Ġto Ġthe Ġover sm oot hing Ġproblem , Ġin Ġwhich Ġfeature Ġvectors Ġon Ġnodes Ġget Ġcloser Ġas Ġwe Ġincrease Ġthe Ġnumber Ġof Ġ( message Ġpassing Ġtype Ġgraph Ġconv olution Ġlayers ) Ġ.	O	O	Review	365

The Ġidea Ġis Ġto Ġpull Ġapart Ġfeature Ġvectors Ġon Ġa Ġpair Ġof Ġnon - adj acent Ġnodes Ġ( based Ġon Ġthe Ġinterpretation Ġof ĠLa place - type Ġsmoot hing Ġby ĠNT Ġand ĠMae h ara Ġ( 2019 )) Ġ.	O	O	Review	365
To Ġachieve Ġthis Ġapproximately Ġwith Ġlow Ġcomputational Ġcomplexity , ĠPair Norm Ġkeeps Ġthe Ġsum Ġof Ġdistances Ġof Ġfeature Ġvectors Ġon Ġall Ġnode Ġpairs Ġapproximately Ġthe Ġsame Ġthroughout Ġlayers Ġ.	O	O	Review	365

Summary Ġ- ĠThe Ġpaper Ġproposes Ġan Ġapproach , Ġcalled Ġthe ĠVari ational ĠBand width ĠBott leneck Ġ( V BB ), Ġcapable Ġof Ġcomp ressing Ġonly Ġa Ġpart Ġof Ġthe Ġinput Ġand Ġstill Ġlearn Ġrepresentations Ġthat Ġare Ġinformative Ġof Ġthe Ġoutput Ġ.	O	O	Review	20645
The Ġapproach Ġis Ġmotivated Ġfrom Ġthe Ġfollowing Ġperspective Ġ-- Ġthere Ġmight Ġbe Ġsituations Ġwhere Ġa Ġ`` part âĢ ļ Ã Ħ Ã´ âĢ ļ Ã Ħ Ã´ Ġof Ġthe Ġinput Ġis Ġprivileged Ġin Ġthe Ġsense Ġthat Ġit Ġmay Ġbe Ġcostly Ġ/ Ġwasteful Ġto Ġmaintain Ġaccess Ġto Ġall Ġthe Ġtime , Ġthereby Ġrendering Ġthe Ġstandard ĠIB Ġpipeline Ġinf eas ible Ġ( as Ġit Ġrequires Ġunrestricted Ġaccess Ġto Ġthe Ġentire Ġinput ) Ġ.	O	O	Review	20645
By Ġbreaking Ġdown Ġthe Ġinput Ġinto Ġstandard Ġ( always Ġavailable ) Ġand Ġprivileged Ġ( not Ġalways Ġavailable ) Ġcomponents , Ġthe Ġpaper Ġproposes Ġa Ġmodule Ġthat Ġdecides Ġwhether Ġto Ġaccess Ġthe Ġprivileged Ġinput Ġduring Ġcompression Ġbased Ġon Ġthe Ġstandard Ġinput Ġ.	O	O	Review	20645
The Ġgoal Ġis Ġto Ġbe Ġable Ġto Ġdecide Ġwhen Ġto Ġaccess Ġprivileged Ġinformation Ġand Ġnot Ġhow Ġto Ġbreak Ġthe Ġoverall Ġinput Ġinto Ġstandard Ġand Ġprivileged Ġcomponents Ġ.	O	O	Review	20645
The Ġapproach Ġtackles Ġa Ġnarrow Ġsubset Ġof Ġproblems Ġcompared Ġto Ġthe Ġstandard Ġinformation Ġbottleneck Ġ.	O	O	Review	20645
The Ġauthors Ġshow Ġthe Ġapplic ability Ġof Ġthe Ġproposed Ġapproach Ġin Ġreinforcement Ġlearning Ġsetups Ġ-- Ġspecifically , Ġ( 1 ) Ġwhen Ġto Ġaccess Ġan Ġexpensive Ġmodel - based Ġplanner Ġfor Ġgoal - driven Ġnavigation ; Ġ( 2 ) Ġwhen Ġto Ġaccess Ġgoal - information Ġin Ġgoal - driven Ġnavigation Ġand Ġ( 3 ) Ġtreating Ġcommunication Ġin Ġa Ġmulti - agent Ġcooperative Ġsetting Ġas Ġ`` priv ileged âĢ ļ Ã Ħ Ã´ âĢ ļ Ã Ħ Ã´ Ġinformation Ġ.	O	O	Review	20645

The Ġexisting Ġdifferent ially Ġprivate Ġtraining Ġmechanism Ġof Ġdeep Ġneural Ġnetworks Ġincludes Ġa Ġstep Ġthat Ġapplies ĠL 2 Ġnormal ization Ġto Ġgradient Ġvectors Ġ.	O	O	Review	20140

[URL] Ġ- ĠFrom ĠAl gorithm Ġ1 Ġof ĠAb adi Ġet Ġal Ġ2016 , Ġone Ġcould Ġsee Ġthat Ġthe Ġnorm Ġof Ġper Ġinstance Ġgradient Ġis Ġat Ġleast ĠC , Ġand Ġthe Ġadded Ġnoise Ġhas Ġstandard Ġdeviation Ġof Ġ\ s igma ĠC . [URL] Ġ- ĠThe Ġoverall Ġalgorithm Ġcan Ġbe Ġunderstood Ġas Ġa Ġsimple Ġcomposition Ġof Ġthe ĠExp onential ĠMechan ism Ġalgorithm Ġand Ġthe ĠDPS GD Ġalgorithm Ġ.	B-Review	B-2	Review	20140

[URL] Ġ- ĠIf Ġthe Ġgoal Ġis Ġto Ġtrain Ġa Ġmodel Ġwith Ġfewer Ġparameters Ġand Ġcomparable Ġutility , Ġwhy Ġnot Ġsimply Ġstarting Ġfrom Ġa Ġsmall Ġmodel Ġwith ĠDPS GD Ġand Ġthen Ġuse Ġthe Ġlarge Ġmodel Ġas Ġa Ġteaching Ġmodel Ġ?	B-Review	B-3	Review	20140

This Ġpaper Ġis Ġa Ġmash - up Ġof Ġrecent Ġwork Ġon Ġdifferent ially Ġprivate Ġsto ch astic Ġgradient Ġdescent Ġ( D PS GD ) Ġand Ġthe Ġlottery Ġticket Ġhypothesis Ġ.	O	O	Review	20140
Different ial Ġprivacy Ġis Ġa Ġparadigm Ġfor Ġensuring Ġthat Ġstatistical Ġmodels Ġlearned Ġfrom Ġa Ġlarge Ġdataset Ġdo Ġnot Ġdisclose Ġany Ġparticulars Ġof Ġindividual Ġelements Ġof Ġthat Ġdataset Ġ.	O	O	Review	20140
D PS GD Ġis Ġa Ġtechnique Ġthat Ġapplies Ġdifferential Ġprivacy Ġideas Ġto Ġmodels Ġtrained Ġwith Ġsto ch astic Ġgradient Ġdescent , Ġwhere Ġprivacy Ġis Ġguaranteed Ġby Ġclipping Ġand Ġadding Ġnoise Ġto Ġgrad ients Ġ.	O	O	Review	20140
On Ġthe Ġother Ġhand , Ġthe Ġlottery Ġticket Ġhypothesis Ġis Ġa Ġmethod Ġfor Ġfinding Ġsparse Ġsub - net works Ġcontained Ġin Ġlarger Ġdense Ġneural Ġnetwork Ġmodels Ġthat Ġare Ġat Ġleast Ġas Ġaccurate Ġas Ġthe Ġunderlying Ġdense Ġmodel Ġ.	O	O	Review	20140
The Ġauthors Ġpropose Ġand Ġdemonstrate Ġthat Ġby Ġcombining ĠDPS GD Ġwith Ġthe Ġlottery Ġticket Ġhypothesis Ġthat Ġthey Ġcan Ġtrain Ġend - to - end Ġdifferent ially Ġprivate Ġmodels Ġthat Ġoutper form Ġthe ĠDPS GD Ġtechnique Ġ.	O	O	Review	20140
[URL] ĠI Ġam Ġup Ġin Ġthe Ġair Ġabout Ġwhether Ġor Ġnot Ġto Ġaccept Ġthis Ġpaper Ġ.	B-Review	B-4	Review	20140

The Ġauthors Ġpresent Ġan Ġonline Ġlearning Ġmethod Ġfor Ġlearning Ġthe Ġstructure Ġof Ġsum - product Ġnetworks Ġ.	O	O	Review	382

The Ġstructure Ġlearning Ġis Ġdone Ġby Ġeither Ġmerging Ġindependent Ġproduct ĠGa ussian Ġnodes Ġinto Ġmult ivariate Ġleaf Ġnodes , Ġor Ġcreating Ġa Ġmixture Ġover Ġthe Ġtwo Ġnodes Ġwhen Ġthe Ġmult ivariate Ġwould Ġbe Ġtoo Ġlarge Ġ.	O	O	Review	382

[URL] Ġ3 D Ġvs . [NUM] ĠD	O	O	Reply	78
- ĠOur Ġmodel Ġcan Ġnot Ġonly Ġgenerate ĠRGB D Ġimages , Ġwhich Ġis Ġcommonly Ġconsidered [NUM] ĠD , Ġbut Ġalso Ġexplicitly Ġcontrol Ġcamera Ġposes Ġwhile Ġpreserving Ġthe Ġimage Ġcontent Ġ.	B-Reply	B-3	Reply	78

I Ġthink Ġthis Ġpaper Ġpresents Ġa Ġuseful Ġcontribution Ġas Ġfar Ġas Ġimproving Ġspeech Ġ/ Ġphon eme Ġrecognition Ġusing Ġself - super vised Ġlearning Ġgoes , Ġand Ġalso Ġhas Ġuseful Ġengineering Ġaspects Ġin Ġterms Ġof Ġcombining ĠCPC Ġand ĠB ERT Ġ.	O	O	Review	219

[URL] Ġ( 1 ) ĠLimited Ġnovelty Ġ-- ĠOur Ġpaper Ġis Ġvery Ġkeen Ġon Ġthe Ġdistinction Ġbetween Ġour Ġwork Ġand ĠShel h amer Ġet Ġal Ġ( 2016 ) Ġand ĠZhu Ġet Ġal Ġ( 2017 ) Ġ.	B-Reply	B-1	Reply	734

This Ġpaper Ġshows Ġthat Ġa Ġpenalty Ġterm Ġcalled Ġrug osity Ġcaptures Ġthe Ġimplicit Ġregular ization Ġeffect Ġof Ġdeep Ġneural Ġnetworks Ġwith ĠRe LU Ġ( and Ġpiece wise Ġaff ine Ġin Ġgeneral ) Ġactivation Ġ.	O	O	Review	20231

[URL] ĠThe Ġpaper Ġstarts Ġby Ġshowing Ġthat Ġthe Ġamount Ġof Ġtraining Ġloss Ġincreased Ġfrom Ġadding Ġdata Ġaug mentation Ġis Ġupper Ġbounded Ġin Ġterms Ġof Ġ( rough ly ) Ġa ĠMonte ĠCarlo Ġapproximate Ġto Ġa ĠHess ian Ġbased Ġmeasure Ġof Ġrug osity Ġ.	O	O	Review	20231

A Ġsomehow Ġsurprising Ġmessage Ġis , Ġhowever , Ġthat Ġif Ġone Ġimposes Ġexplicit Ġregular ization Ġwith Ġrug osity Ġin Ġlieu Ġof Ġdata Ġaug mentation , Ġthen Ġthe Ġbetter Ġgeneral ization Ġusually Ġseen Ġfrom Ġdata Ġaug mentation Ġno Ġlonger Ġpresents , Ġthough Ġone Ġdoes Ġget Ġa Ġnetwork Ġwith Ġsmaller Ġrug osity Ġ. [URL] ĠTwo Ġmain Ġfeatures Ġof Ġour Ġmeasure Ġdistinguish Ġit Ġfrom Ġthe ĠL ips ch itz Ġconstant : Ġ1 ) ĠRug osity Ġdepends Ġon Ġthe ĠHess ian Ġof Ġthe Ġfunction Ġgenerated Ġby Ġthe Ġdeep Ġnetwork , Ġwhich Ġis Ġa Ġsecond - order Ġsmooth ness Ġmeasure Ġ.	B-Reply	B-1	Reply	20231
<sep> ĠIn Ġcontrast , Ġthe ĠL ips ch itz Ġconstant Ġis Ġa Ġfirst - order Ġmeasure Ġthat Ġdepends Ġon Ġthe Ġfirst Ġderivative Ġ( Jacob ian ) Ġof Ġthe Ġnetwork Ġ.	I-Reply	I-1	Reply	20231
In Ġother Ġwords , Ġrug osity Ġquant ifies Ġhow Ġmuch Ġthe Ġfunction Ġgenerated Ġby Ġa Ġdeep Ġnetwork Ġdiffers Ġfrom Ġan Ġaff ine Ġmapping Ġover Ġthe Ġinput Ġspace Ġ.	I-Reply	I-1	Reply	20231
We Ġbelieve Ġrug osity Ġprovides Ġa Ġbetter Ġmeasure Ġfor Ġcomplexity , Ġespecially Ġwhen Ġthe Ġnetwork Ġconsists Ġof Ġcontinuous Ġpiece wise Ġlinear Ġactiv ations Ġthat Ġresult Ġin Ġa Ġcontinuous Ġpiece wise Ġlinear Ġprediction Ġfunction Ġ.	I-Reply	I-1	Reply	20231
2 ) ĠIn Ġmany Ġapplications , Ġfor Ġexample Ġwhen Ġthe Ġinput Ġdata Ġconsists Ġof Ġnatural Ġimages , Ġthe Ġtraining Ġdata Ġpoints Ġlie Ġon Ġa Ġlower - dimensional Ġmanifold Ġof Ġdimension Ġ.	I-Reply	I-1	Reply	20231
We Ġcan Ġexploit Ġthis Ġlocal Ġge omet rical Ġstructure Ġto Ġevaluate Ġthe Ġprediction Ġmapping Ġas Ġa Ġfunction Ġof Ġthe Ġmanifold Ġlocal Ġcoordinates Ġand Ġcompute Ġthe Ġrug osity Ġon Ġthe Ġdata Ġmanifold Ġ.	I-Reply	I-1	Reply	20231
This Ġresult Ġis Ġa Ġnatural Ġdata - driven Ġcomplexity Ġmeasure Ġfor Ġthat Ġevaluates Ġits Ġcomplexity Ġover Ġthe Ġsignal Ġspace Ġof Ġimportance Ġ.	I-Reply	I-1	Reply	20231

This Ġpaper Ġshows Ġ( the orem Ġ1 ) Ġthat Ġdata Ġaug mentation Ġ( DA ) Ġinduces Ġa Ġreduction Ġof Ġr ugs ity Ġon Ġthe Ġloss Ġfunction Ġassociated Ġto Ġthe Ġmodel Ġ.	O	O	Review	20231

[URL] ĠI Ġlean Ġto Ġreject Ġthis Ġpaper Ġbecause Ġthe Ġcontributions , Ġeven Ġif Ġinteresting , Ġdo Ġnot Ġlead Ġto Ġany Ġnew Ġunderstanding Ġof Ġthe Ġtopic Ġ.	O	O	Review	20231

This Ġpaper Ġshows Ġthat ĠDA Ġinduces Ġrug osity Ġ( the orem Ġ1 ), Ġbut Ġrug osity Ġdoes Ġnot Ġimprove Ġgeneral ization Ġ( em pir ically ) Ġ.	I-Review	I-2	Review	20231

[URL] ĠI Ġvote Ġfor Ġrejecting Ġfor Ġthis Ġpaper , Ġbecause Ġof Ġthe Ġfollowing Ġtwo Ġconcerns :	O	O	Review	20520
<sep> Ġ1 Ġ.	O	O	Review	20520

[URL] Ġ2 Ġ.	B-Review	B-4	Review	20520

[LINE] ĠSUM M ARY [LINE]	O	O	Review	20520
This Ġpaper Ġgives Ġtwo Ġmethods Ġfor Ġimproving Ġan Ġexisting Ġdifferent ially Ġprivate Ġmodel Ġ.	O	O	Review	20520
Both Ġmethods Ġassume Ġa Ġsource Ġof Ġunl abel ed Ġdata Ġthat Ġrequires Ġno Ġprivacy Ġguarantees Ġ.	O	O	Review	20520
The Ġtwo Ġmethods Ġmake Ġdifferent Ġuses Ġof Ġthis Ġpublic Ġdata Ġto Ġaugment Ġthe Ġoriginal Ġprivate Ġmodel Ġ.	O	O	Review	20520
Both Ġpreserve Ġ( a Ġdegree Ġof ) Ġprivacy Ġfor Ġthe Ġoriginal Ġmodel Ġ.	O	O	Review	20520
[URL] ĠThe Ġfirst Ġmethod Ġis ĠD iverse Public Ġ.	O	O	Review	20520
D iverse Public Ġonly Ġpost - process es Ġthe Ġoriginal Ġprivate Ġmodel ĠM Ġ-- Ġin Ġparticular , Ġit Ġdoes Ġnot Ġtouch Ġthe Ġoriginal Ġdata Ġ-- Ġand Ġso Ġits Ġprivacy Ġis Ġimmediate Ġ.	O	O	Review	20520
At Ġa Ġhigh Ġlevel , ĠD iverse Public Ġworks Ġby Ġpicking Ġthe Ġ" best " Ġunl ab elled Ġdata Ġpoints Ġfor Ġaugment ing ĠM . ĠFirst , Ġit Ġapplies ĠM Ġto Ġthe Ġunl abel ed Ġdata Ġand Ġthen Ġapplies ĠPC A Ġto Ġthe Ġresult Ġ.	O	O	Review	20520
Next , Ġit Ġselects Ġhighly Ġ" unc ertain " Ġpoints , Ġprojects Ġthem Ġonto Ġthe Ġtop Ġk Ġprincipal Ġcomponents , Ġand Ġclusters Ġthe Ġresults Ġ.	O	O	Review	20520
Finally , Ġit Ġselects Ġsamples Ġfrom Ġeach Ġcluster Ġand Ġuses Ġthem Ġto Ġaugment ĠM . ĠThis Ġaugment ing Ġprocess , Ġcalled ĠFine T une , Ġis Ġleft Ġas Ġa Ġblack Ġbox Ġ.	O	O	Review	20520
[URL] ĠThe Ġsecond Ġmethod Ġis ĠNear Private Ġ.	O	O	Review	20520
The Ġgiven Ġmotivation Ġfor ĠNear Private Ġis Ġthat Ġthe Ġpublic Ġdataset Ġmay Ġhave Ġa Ġdifferent Ġdistribution Ġthan Ġthe Ġoriginal Ġprivate Ġtraining Ġdata Ġ.	O	O	Review	20520
To Ġaddress Ġthis , ĠNear Private Ġuses ĠDP - PC A Ġ( a Ġpre - existing Ġtechnique Ġfor Ġdifferent ially Ġprivate ĠPC A ) Ġon Ġthe Ġprivate Ġdataset Ġand Ġprojects Ġboth Ġthe Ġprivate Ġand Ġpublic Ġdata Ġonto Ġthe Ġtop Ġk Ġprincipal Ġcomponents Ġ.	O	O	Review	20520
Then Ġit Ġcompares Ġuncertain Ġpoints Ġin Ġthe Ġpublic Ġand Ġprivate Ġdataset Ġprojections Ġand Ġonly Ġaug ments ĠM Ġ( again Ġusing Ġthe Ġblack Ġbox ĠFine T une ) Ġusing Ġuncertain Ġpublic Ġexamples Ġwith Ġmany Ġnearby Ġuncertain Ġprivate Ġsamples Ġ.	O	O	Review	20520
Int uitive ly , Ġthis Ġshould Ġselect Ġfor Ġpoints Ġthat Ġare Ġnot Ġtoo Ġdifferent Ġthan Ġthe Ġoriginal Ġprivate Ġtraining Ġdata Ġ.	O	O	Review	20520
[URL] ĠThe Ġpaper Ġthen Ġevaluates Ġthese Ġalgorithms Ġwith Ġexperiments Ġon ĠMN IST Ġand ĠSV H N Ġunder Ġreasonable Ġprivacy Ġparameters Ġ( I Ġthink Ġ-- Ġsee Ġbelow ) Ġ.	O	O	Review	20520
These Ġexperiments Ġcompare Ġthe Ġperformance Ġof ĠD iverse Public Ġand ĠNear Private , Ġwhere Ġboth Ġtrain ĠM Ġusing Ġvanilla ĠDP - SG D Ġ[ Ab adi Ġet Ġal Ġ2016 ]. ĠD iverse Public Ġand ĠNear Private Ġtrade Ġperformances Ġon ĠMN IST Ġand ĠSV H N , Ġbut ĠNear Private Ġdoes Ġ( as Ġmight Ġbe Ġexpected ) Ġbetter Ġwhen Ġthe Ġpublic Ġdataset Ġis Ġpolluted Ġ.	O	O	Review	20520
[URL] ĠIn Ġsummary , Ġthe Ġpaper Ġsuggests ĠD iverse Public Ġand ĠNear Private Ġas Ġuseful Ġways Ġto Ġaugment Ġa Ġgiven Ġdifferent ially Ġprivate Ġmodel ĠM Ġusing Ġpublic Ġdata , Ġand Ġtheir Ġexperiments Ġsuggest Ġthis Ġis Ġreasonable Ġ.	O	O	Review	20520

This Ġpaper Ġinvestigates Ġthe Ġquestion Ġof Ġinternal Ġconsistency Ġin Ġemer gent Ġcommunication Ġ.	O	O	Review	617

The Ġpaper Ġproposes Ġa Ġnovel Ġdata Ġaugment ations Ġapproach Ġthat Ġimproves Ġthe Ġrobust ness Ġof Ġa Ġmodel Ġon Ġthe ĠC IF AR - 10 Ġand ĠImage Net ĠCommon ĠCor rupt ions Ġbenchmarks Ġwhile Ġmaintaining Ġtraining Ġaccuracy Ġon Ġclean Ġdata Ġ.	O	O	Review	335
To Ġachieve Ġthis , Ġthe Ġpaper Ġproposes Ġa Ġrather Ġsimple Ġaug mentation Ġmechanism Ġthat Ġis Ġinspired Ġby ĠCut Out Ġ( De V ries Ġ& amp ; ĠTaylor Ġ2017 ) Ġand ĠGa ussian Ġ( Grand val et Ġ& amp ; ĠKan u , Ġ1997 ): Ġadding ĠGa ussian Ġnoise Ġto Ġrandom Ġpatches Ġin Ġthe Ġimage Ġ.	O	O	Review	335
This Ġsimple Ġapproach Ġis Ġshown Ġto Ġwork Ġsurprisingly Ġwell Ġon Ġthe Ġcorruption Ġbenchmarks Ġ.	O	O	Review	335
It Ġseems Ġreasonable Ġthat Ġwhile Ġadding ĠGa ussian Ġnoise Ġmakes Ġthe Ġmodel Ġrobust Ġto Ġhigh Ġfrequency Ġnoise , Ġsince ĠGa ussian Ġnoise Ġis Ġnot Ġadded Ġeverywhere , Ġthe Ġmodel Ġis Ġable Ġto Ġexploit Ġhigh Ġfrequency Ġsignal Ġwhen Ġavailable Ġin Ġthe Ġinput Ġ.	B-Review	B-1	Review	335

This Ġpaper Ġintroduces Ġa Ġnew Ġmethod Ġto Ġmake Ġen semb les Ġof Ġdecision Ġtrees Ġdifferent iable , Ġand Ġtrain able Ġwith Ġ( st och astic ) Ġgradient Ġdescent Ġ.	O	O	Review	10099
The Ġproposed Ġtechnique Ġrelies Ġon Ġthe Ġconcept Ġof Ġ" ob livious Ġdecision Ġtrees ", Ġwhich Ġare Ġa Ġkind Ġof Ġdecision Ġtrees Ġthat Ġuse Ġthe Ġsame Ġclass ifier Ġ( i . e . Ġa Ġfeature Ġand Ġthreshold ) Ġfor Ġall Ġthe Ġnodes Ġthat Ġhave Ġthe Ġsame Ġdepth Ġ.	O	O	Review	10099
This Ġmeans Ġthat Ġfor Ġan Ġoblivious Ġdecision Ġtree Ġof Ġdepth Ġd , Ġonly Ġd Ġclass ifiers Ġare Ġlearned Ġ.	O	O	Review	10099
Said Ġotherwise , Ġan Ġoblivious Ġdecision Ġtree Ġis Ġa Ġclass ifier Ġthat Ġsplit Ġthe Ġdata Ġusing Ġd Ġsplitting Ġfeatures , Ġgiving Ġa Ġdecision Ġtable Ġof Ġsize Ġ2 ^ d Ġ.	O	O	Review	10099
To Ġmake Ġoblivious Ġdecision Ġtrees Ġdifferent iable , Ġthe Ġauthors Ġpropose Ġto Ġlearn Ġlinear Ġclass ifiers Ġusing Ġall Ġthe Ġfeatures , Ġbut Ġadd Ġa Ġsp arsity Ġinducing Ġoperator Ġon Ġthe Ġweights Ġof Ġthe Ġclass ifiers Ġ( the Ġent max Ġtransformation ) Ġ.	O	O	Review	10099
Similarly , Ġthe Ġstep Ġfunction Ġused Ġto Ġsplit Ġthe Ġdata Ġis Ġreplaced Ġby Ġa Ġcontinuous Ġversion Ġ( here Ġa Ġbinary Ġent max Ġtransformation ) Ġ.	O	O	Review	10099
Finally , Ġthe Ġdecision Ġfunction Ġis Ġobtained Ġby Ġtaking Ġthe Ġouter Ġproduct Ġof Ġall Ġthe Ġscores Ġof Ġthe Ġclass ifiers : Ġ[ c _ 1 ( x ), Ġ1 - c _ 1 ( x )] Ġo Ġ[ c _ 2 ( x ), Ġ1 - c _ 2 ( x )] Ġ... ĠThis Ġ" choice " Ġoperator Ġtransforms Ġthe Ġd Ġdimensional Ġvectors Ġof Ġthe Ġclass ifier Ġscores Ġto Ġa Ġ2 ^ d Ġdimensional Ġvector Ġ.	O	O	Review	10099
Another Ġinterpretation Ġof Ġthe Ġproposed Ġ" different iable Ġoblivious Ġdecision Ġtrees " Ġis Ġa Ġtwo Ġlayer Ġneural Ġnetwork , Ġwith Ġsp arsity Ġon Ġthe Ġweights Ġof Ġthe Ġfirst Ġlayer ,	O	O	Review	10099
and Ġan Ġactivation Ġfunction Ġcombining Ġthe Ġent max Ġtransformation Ġand Ġthe Ġouter Ġproduct Ġoperator Ġ.	O	O	Review	10099
The Ġauthors Ġthen Ġpropose Ġto Ġcombine Ġmultiple Ġdifferent iable Ġdecision Ġtrees Ġin Ġone Ġlayer , Ġgiving Ġthe Ġneural Ġdecision Ġoblivious Ġensemble Ġ( N ODE ) Ġ.	O	O	Review	10099
Finally , Ġseveral ĠN ODE Ġlayers Ġcan Ġbe Ġcombined Ġin Ġa Ġdense Ġnet Ġfashion , Ġto Ġobtain Ġa Ġdeep Ġdecision Ġtree Ġmodel Ġ.	O	O	Review	10099
The Ġproposed Ġmethod Ġis Ġevaluated Ġon Ġ6 Ġdatasets Ġ( half Ġclassification , Ġhalf Ġregression ), Ġand Ġcompared Ġto Ġexisting Ġdecision Ġtree Ġmethods Ġsuch Ġas ĠX GB o ost Ġor ĠCat Boost , Ġas Ġwell Ġas Ġfeed Ġforward Ġneural Ġnetworks Ġ.	O	O	Review	10099
[URL] ĠThe Ġpaper Ġis Ġclearly Ġwritten , Ġideas Ġare Ġwell Ġpresented , Ġand Ġit Ġis Ġeasy Ġto Ġfollow Ġthe Ġderiv ation Ġof Ġthe Ġmethod Ġ.	B-Review	B-1	Review	10099

This Ġpaper Ġproposes Ġa Ġsimple Ġmethod Ġfor Ġstabil izing Ġthe Ġoff - policy Ġdeep Ġreinforcement Ġlearning Ġalgorithm , Ġwhich Ġupdates Ġthe Ġtarget Ġnetwork Ġonly Ġwhen Ġthe Ġonline Ġnetwork Ġperforms Ġbetter Ġthan Ġthe Ġtarget Ġnetwork Ġin Ġorder Ġto Ġensure Ġthe Ġstability Ġguarantees Ġ.	O	O	Review	20009
More Ġspecifically , Ġat Ġevery ĠT Ġtime Ġsteps , Ġthey Ġexecute Ġboth Ġthe Ġonline Ġnetwork Ġand Ġthe Ġtarget Ġnetwork Ġso Ġas Ġto Ġevaluate Ġthe Ġperformance Ġof Ġeach Ġpolicy Ġ.	O	O	Review	20009
Then , Ġthey Ġupdate Ġthe Ġtarget Ġnetwork Ġonly Ġwhen Ġthe Ġonline Ġnetwork Ġoutper forms Ġthe Ġtarget Ġnetwork Ġwith Ġhigh Ġprobability Ġ.	O	O	Review	20009
The Ġexperimental Ġresults Ġshow Ġthat Ġthe Ġproposed ĠConservative - TD 3 Ġ( C - TD 3 ) Ġis Ġless Ġprone Ġto Ġperformance Ġdegradation Ġduring Ġtraining Ġ.	O	O	Review	20009
[URL] ĠWhile Ġthe Ġstabil izing Ġoff - policy Ġreinforcement Ġlearning Ġalgorithms Ġwould Ġbe Ġa Ġsignificant Ġproblem , ĠI Ġhave Ġsome Ġconcerns Ġregarding Ġthe Ġpresentation Ġand Ġthe Ġlimitation Ġof Ġthe Ġproposed Ġmethod Ġ.	B-Review	B-6	Review	20009
<sep> Ġ- ĠIn Ġp 2 , Ġ' Value ĠIter ation Ġand ĠPolicy ĠIter ation Ġare Ġalgorithms Ġfor Ġsolving Ġtab ular ĠRL Ġtasks Ġwith Ġconvergence Ġguarantee ': ĠBasically , Ġexact Ġvalue Ġiteration Ġand Ġpolicy Ġiteration Ġare ĠM DP Ġ' plan ning ' Ġalgorithms , ĠNOT Ġreinforcement Ġlearning Ġalgorithms Ġ. The Ġauthors Ġpropose Ġan Ġapproach Ġwhere Ġthey Ġaggregate , Ġfor Ġeach Ġcandidate Ġanswer , Ġtext Ġfrom Ġsupporting Ġpassages Ġ.	O	O	Review	254

<sep> Ġ* ĠFirst Ġdrawback : Ġsub optim ality Ġof Ġthe ĠGenerator Ġ.	I-Reply	I-1	Reply	166
In Ġtheory , Ġif Ġthe Ġgenerator Ġwas Ġoptimal , Ġunder Ġsuitable Ġconditions Ġfor Ġthe Ġmeasurement Ġprocess ĠF , Ġit Ġwould Ġgenerate Ġoutputs Ġbelonging Ġto Ġthe Ġmanifold Ġof Ġunc or rupted Ġimages Ġ( that Ġwe Ġshall Ġname ĠM ) Ġ.	I-Reply	I-1	Reply	166

This Ġmeans Ġthat Ġit Ġis Ġpossible Ġthat Ġimages Ġfrom Ġthe Ġmanifold Ġof Ġgenerated Ġimages Ġdo Ġnot Ġcorrespond Ġto Ġtrue Ġsamples : Ġapplying Ġgradient Ġdescent Ġto Ġminimize Ġthe Ġaforementioned Ġdistances , Ġtend Ġto Ġgenerate Ġimages Ġsimilar Ġto Ġthe Ġcorrupted Ġimages Ġy , Ġand Ġnot Ġto Ġunc or rupted Ġimages Ġx . This Ġpaper Ġproposes Ġa Ġnew Ġmethod Ġfor Ġestimating Ġoptimal Ġtransport Ġplans Ġand Ġmaps Ġamong Ġcontinuous Ġdistributions , Ġor Ġdiscrete Ġdistributions Ġwith Ġlarge Ġsupport Ġsize Ġ.	O	O	Review	442
First , Ġthe Ġpaper Ġproposes Ġa Ġdual Ġalgorithm Ġto Ġestimate ĠKant or ovich Ġplans , Ġi . e . Ġa Ġcoupling Ġbetween Ġtwo Ġinput Ġdistributions Ġminimizing Ġa Ġgiven Ġcost Ġfunction , Ġusing Ġdual Ġfunctions Ġparameter ized Ġas Ġneural Ġnetworks Ġ.	O	O	Review	442
Then Ġan Ġalgorithm Ġis Ġgiven Ġto Ġconvert Ġa Ġgeneric Ġplan Ġinto Ġa ĠMon ge Ġmap , Ġa Ġdeter ministic Ġfunction Ġfrom Ġone Ġdomain Ġto Ġthe Ġother , Ġfollowing Ġthe Ġb ary center Ġof Ġthe Ġplan Ġ.	O	O	Review	442
The Ġalgorithms Ġare Ġshown Ġto Ġbe Ġconsistent , Ġand Ġdemonstrated Ġto Ġbe Ġmore Ġefficient Ġthan Ġan Ġexisting Ġsemi - du al Ġalgorithm Ġ.	O	O	Review	442
Initial Ġapplications Ġto Ġdomain Ġadaptation Ġand Ġgener ative Ġmodeling Ġare Ġalso Ġshown Ġ.	O	O	Review	442

This Ġpaper Ġproposes Ġan Ġinstance - wise Ġfeature Ġselection Ġmethod , Ġwhich Ġchooses Ġrelevant Ġfeatures Ġfor Ġeach Ġindividual Ġsample Ġ.	O	O	Review	171

The Ġgoal Ġis Ġto Ġminimize Ġthe Ġdifference Ġbetween Ġthe Ġbaseline Ġloss Ġand Ġpredictor Ġloss Ġ.	O	O	Review	171

The Ġpaper Ġintroduces Ġa Ġnovel Ġway Ġof Ġlearning ĠHamilton ian Ġdynamics Ġwith Ġa Ġgener ative Ġnetwork Ġ.	O	O	Review	397
The ĠHamilton ian Ġgener ative Ġnetwork Ġ( H GN ) Ġlearns Ġthe Ġdynamics Ġdirectly Ġfrom Ġdata Ġby Ġembed ding Ġobservations Ġin Ġa Ġlatent Ġspace , Ġwhich Ġis Ġthen Ġtransformed Ġinto Ġa Ġphase Ġspace Ġdescribing Ġthe Ġsystem 's Ġinitial Ġ( ab stract ) Ġposition Ġand Ġmomentum Ġ.	O	O	Review	397
Using Ġa Ġsecond Ġnetwork , Ġthe ĠHamilton ian Ġnetwork , Ġthe Ġposition Ġand Ġmomentum Ġare Ġreduced Ġto Ġa Ġscal ar , Ġinterpreted Ġas Ġthe ĠHamilton ian Ġof Ġthe Ġsystem , Ġwhich Ġcan Ġthen Ġbe Ġused Ġto Ġdo Ġroll outs Ġin Ġthe Ġphase Ġspace Ġusing Ġtechniques Ġknown Ġfrom , Ġe . g ., ĠHamilton ian ĠMonte ĠCarlo Ġsampling Ġ.	O	O	Review	397
Finally , Ġa Ġdec oder Ġnetwork Ġcan Ġuse Ġthe Ġsystem 's Ġphase Ġspace Ġlocation Ġat Ġany Ġrollout Ġstep Ġto Ġgenerate Ġimages Ġof Ġthe Ġsystem Ġ.	O	O	Review	397
